entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to pin arrays of unmanaged structs #68686
    7.0.0
  • Crossgen2: Add Option to Report Missing Assemblies #68683
    7.0.0
  • Support single-file core dump generation on Linux/MacOS in 8.0 #68676
    Future
  • IHttpClientBuilder should have extension to redact query parameter from logging #68675
  • Assertion failed 'node->DefinesLocalAddr(this, size, &lcl, nullptr) && lvaGetDesc(lcl)->lvHiddenBufferStructArg' #68669
    7.0.0
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Runtime, Version=6.0.0.0 ... (0x80131040) in self-contained app when solution contains a .NET 3.1 project #68666
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Array for ARM64 #68667
  • [Perf] Changes at 4/23/2022 1:52:07 AM #68665
  • Exception when create a named Mutex with a slash on macos #68661
  • Using only a static method generates warnings from the ctor #68660
  • System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.FromMappings throws NullReferenceException using a pre-generated serialization assembly #68659
  • Building clr subset emits tons of command line warnings #68658
  • Assert failure: `!pFlat->HasReadyToRunHeader()` #68654
  • CultureInfoConverter doesn't work correctly with UseSystemResourceKeys=true #68651
    7.0.0
  • JSON serialization of nullable enum fields #68647
    7.0.0
  • Could not load or assemble system.serviceprocess.servicecontroller on windows services. #68646
  • `fgMorphMultiregStructArg` should only use the ABI information #68645
    7.0.0
  • Inconsequent default message handling in system validator attributes #68644
  • dotnet crashes on rhel8 arm64 while unwinding stack #68640
  • [API Proposal]: Add new Task() constructors to be consistent with Task.Run() #68637
  • The "MonoAOTCompiler" task failed unexpectedly #68633

Closed

  • Clean up FileSystemWatcher tests use of temp files #68430
  • Support Single File Diagnostics #45382
    7.0.0
  • Performance improvement for Guid.Equals #52296
    7.0.0
  • JIT: libraries PGO tests time out #59667
    7.0.0
  • Dead cloned loops are not removed #5820
    7.0.0
  • RyuJIT's loop cloning optimization has questionable CQ #4929
    7.0.0
  • Inliner: methodology for code quality measurements #5673
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 4/3/2022 6:13:34 PM #68433
    7.0.0
  • Blazor WASM: PostAsJsonAsync missing response header content-disposition #67691
  • .NET 7.0.100-preview.2.22153.17 crash on RHEL 8+arm64 #67551
  • AOT compilation failure with .NET 7 preview 3 #68548
  • Assertion failure in `System.Text.Json.Serialization.Converters.ObjectWithParameterizedConstructorConverter`1.TryLookupConstructorParameter` #68584
  • Assertion failed in System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.LookupProperty #67816
  • Enabling SIMD for System.Numerics.Vector4 causes an assertion in mini-llvm.c:5817 #67762
    7.0.0
  • Proposal: Unify delegates which have the same Invoke method signature #6697
    Future
  • CancellationToken/CancellatonTokenSource is not extendable. #67119
    Future
  • When I get the default value of the method parameter as `long` through reflection, the result is `DbNull` instead of `0` #67364
  • Test failure: XmlSerializerTests.XmlMembersMapping_With_ChoiceIdentifier, XmlSerializerTests.XmlMembersMapping_IntArray #68527
    7.0.0
  • Record like structs cannot be marshalled using LibraryImportGenerator #68634
  • ILCompiler.DependencyAnalysisFramework targets net5.0 which is out-of-support soon #68595

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the TypeConverter when enabling UseSystemResourceKeys #68687
    area-System.ComponentModel, 7.0.0
  • Blazor Hybrid iOS & Mac Catalyst Performance Profiling #68685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix declaration hiding in host #68684
    area-Host
  • Add a document describing how to triage CI test failures #68682
  • BuildID parameter correction #68681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1743026 #68680
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix a few TODOs in regex #68679
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • refactor SslStream internals #68678
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add X86Serialize hardware intrinsic. #68677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Unloadability bugs fixes #68674
    Servicing-consider, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Adding generic-math support for CLong and CULong #68673
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix default install location used when running under x64 emulation on Windows arm64. #68671
    area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Update solution files to include missing deps #68668
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix JsonStringEnumConverter bug concerning handling of negative values in changing cultures #68663
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Clean up some ActiveIssues in regex #68657
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [MONO] Refactored code into marshal-ilgen and marshal-shared. #68656
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix RegexCompiler regression on 32-bit for some set matching #68655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Ensure TestHandleCollector has enough memory pressure to trigger #68652
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-bug, 7.0.0
  • [mono][eventpipe] Write primitive types and UTF-16 strings in little endian order #68648
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Migrate rest of the JS interop functions to out params #68642
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • `PUTARG_STK`/x86: mark `push [mem]` candidates reg optional #68641
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use all processor groups if the process is not affinitized to a single one #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • regenerate networking ref assemblies #68630
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Condition S.S.Cryptography tests on SHA1 signature support #67998
    area-System.Security
  • Avoid Path.Join(string, ...) allocations for null/empty inputs #68662
    area-System.IO
  • Add RL non-generic fixed window, sliding window implementations #68087
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Pass build id to clang on Unix for NativeAOT #68638
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use file-scoped namespaces in API proposal template #68295
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix Typo in Manual Console Testing #68672
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Revert "Set SocketsHttpHandler's default connect timeout to 15s (#66607)" #68649
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fixing some bad inheritdoc comments #68664
  • Removed TempFile and TempDirectory from FileSystemWatcher Tests #68444
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove gtSetCallArgsOrder quirk #68621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix interop source generator error message to match the approved API surface #68635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Remove the BBSweep header and uses #68643
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use SYSLIB prefix for all LibraryImportGenerator diagnostics #68613
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix firefox tests running on windows #68620
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Delete .NET Framework ildasm headers from test sources #68614
  • Lock EnsureConfigured to prevent initialization issues in JsonTypeInfo #68605
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm] print full json results of bench sample #68594
    area-System.Console
  • Maui Blazor Hybrid Android Performance Profiling #68628
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Minimize the build graph by deleting unnecessary references #68603
    area-Meta
  • Remove GTF_LATE_ARG #68617
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `CLS_VAR` #68524
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Always set `IND_NONFAULTING` for not-null addresses #68518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix bad arm64 move peephole #68631
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update AOT toolchain target to NetCoreAppToolCurrent #68606
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • [Infrastructure] Update devcontainer #67656
    area-Infrastructure
  • Adding the 2-parameter xplat shuffle helpers and accelerating them #68559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Hoist the nullchecks for 'this' object #68588
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add initial impl of PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #67677
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • WIP: CoreCLR support for default interface implementation of static virtual methods #66887
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] More LLVM refactoring to support LLVM 14.x. #68426
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Correct MSVC version in requirements documentation #68078
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Add retry logic to FSW tests File/Directory_Move_Multiple_From_* #68066
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Annotating System.Text.Json library for aot form factor #68464
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] JIT: fix bug where a gc struct is not zero initialized #68050
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, no-recent-activity, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] add support for parsing Unified TLS hello #68425
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.6
  • Add C instrumentation to native libs (Native PGO) #67820
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Default interface implementations of static virtual methods - ECMA-335 augments #67619
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Add special Comparer/EqualityComparer for Nullable<Enum> #68077
    area-System.Runtime
  • Add more array.sort test combination #68489
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Ensure decimal.TryWriteSignificandLittleEndian correctly takes endianness into account #68599
    area-System.Runtime
  • Fixing API compat issues between ref/src for attributes on properties #68432
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add ProcessorCount Event to RuntimeEventSource #65581
    area-System.Diagnostics, 7.0.0
  • Reenable 4244 #68615
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add UseSystemd() and UseWindowsService() IServiceCollection extension methods #68580
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Allow empty directory values in FileSystemEventArgs/RenamedEventArgs ctors #68582
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Use x64 directory if running x64 process on arm64 apphost #68583
    area-Host
  • Start morphing `TYP_STRUCT` local indirections in `LocalAddressVisitor` #68515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Release/6.0] Backport test fixes #68332
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Updating Complex to implement INumberBase and ISignedNumber #68612
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Handle "mis-sized" structs in XARCH `PUTARG_STK` codegen #68611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reenable SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits test #67419
    area-System.Net.Http
  • issue-2214 Create File.ReadLinesAsync() #66492
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move reflection based converter and contract resolution logic to DefaultJsonTypeInfoResolver #68496
    area-System.Text.Json
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wip] Run tests on more Android versions #64341
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use a faster sort algorithm pdqsort for Array.Sort #68436
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Added the fix to make use of the heap hard limit instead of the region range while using large pages. #68629
    area-GC-coreclr
  • WIP: Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add native aot test with EnableAotAnalyzer set to false #25125
  • Default ImplicitUsings for Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web create ambiguity when referencing IHostingEnvironment #25121
  • Building a test project with runtime results in either NETSDK1179 or NETSDK1031 #25118

Closed

  • NU1505: Duplicate 'PackageDownload' items warning is raised when the SDK uses PackageDownload to get packages. #24747
  • donnet 3.1 seems broken on last openSUSE Tumbleweed #25069
  • Ubuntu 21.10 `dotnet` installed from snap segmentation fault #24944

PullRequests

Created

  • Use System.Environment to obtain user HOME dir #25117
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25116
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25090
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Support PublicKey metadata on InternalsVisibleTo #25000
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a test for native lib #25060
    Area-ILLink
  • Next helix test move #25057
    Area-Infrastructure
  • bump WarningLevel to 7 for .NET 7 #24826
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Set TargetFrameworkMonikerDisplayName for .NET Standard and .NET Core/.NET5+ projects. #24656
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve parser error recovery for contextual and positionally-sensitive modifiers #61025
    Compiler.Next
  • Two new lowerCamelCase rules for (local variables and parameters) under Tools>Options>Text Editor>C#>Code Style>General #61024
  • Improved suggestions for possible redundant conditional statements #61023
  • [17.1.5] Improvements to the new "Base types/implemented interfaces" view ("inheritance margin"?) #61022
  • .editorconfig does not have the ability to warn if a function is too long, or if the number of characters in a line exceeds 80 characters. #61021
  • Reenable DotNetSdk editorconfig tests on linux #61017
  • Applying IDE0030 on target-typed ternary results in broken code #61016
    Backlog
  • Gold bars appear in VS when modifying a conditional expression and lambdas #61013
    Compiler.Next
  • Emit `GC.AllocateUninitializedArray` for an initialized array creation expression #61011
  • Bypass Find panel when search returns only one other result #61010
    Backlog
  • No warning for obsolete constructor when using generic `new()` constraint #61009
    Compiler.Next
  • Inferred delegate type for method group should include any default parameter values #61007

Closed

  • Refactoring between a cast operator and an as operator does not produce identical functionality #61014
    Backlog
  • Questions for semi-auto properties #61019
  • Feature 'semantic classification' is currently unavailable due to internal error (VB compiler crash) #60525
    Compiler.Next
  • Inheritance margin: Show tooltip of fully qualified name #55790
    17.2
  • Inheritance margin should add more information to disambiguate identically named items. #60627
    17.3
  • Disable live code analysis #60892
  • IDE0060 should not activate when a base member is hidden with `new` #60902
    Backlog
  • Generate Editorconfig produces half german properties. Should be english. #60939
  • VB implement abstract class adds NullableAttributes #60963
  • Typo in Code Cleanup UI #60985
  • Getting projects from a solution (old vs. sdk style csproj) #60996

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge 'main' into 'DefaultInterfaceImplementation' #61026
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Use IAsyncDisposable instead of AsyncLazy<T> for lazy cancellation of final OOP request #61020
    Area-IDE
  • [WIP] Oop resiliency #61015
    Area-IDE
  • Fix XmlTextAttribute space normalization #61012
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Make NamingPreferences message-pack serializable #61006
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Backport publish assets script changes #61028
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix typo in publish assets script #61027
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Temporarily disable editorconfig tests on linux #61018
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Emit ObsoleteAttribute for required member constructors #61005
    Area-Compilers
  • [LSP] Remove semantic tokens IsFinalized logic #60993
    Approved to merge, LSP
  • Add support for LSP semantic token refresh. #61003
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Handle cases where 'field' keyword shouldn't generate a field #60806
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • API for exposing imports (including global imports) from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-approved, Next
  • Add support to inheritance margin to disambiguate same-named items. #60992
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge 'RelaxingShiftOperator' into 'main' #61000
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, Next
  • Adjust timeout on helix runs to 15 minutes to ensure dumps are captur… #61001
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61004
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61030
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #61029
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Code generator fallback options #60882
    Area-IDE
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Add feature to show users what global-usings are in scope at the top of a file. #60893
    Area-IDE, Feature Request
  • Enable declaration, implementation(in non-interfaces) and consumption of virtual static members. #60965
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Change ServiceHub host names #60778
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update simplify-type-names to understand global imports. #60872
    Area-Compilers
  • Cherry-Pick 60973 To 17.2 #60999
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Changed IDE0059 codefix title in pattern matching #60822
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix assertion failure for optional VB attribute with invalid type (Approach 2) #60933
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix assertion failure for optional VB attribute with invalid type #60924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Suppress formatting with stackalloc array creations #59808
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Verify arguments length for diagnostic messages #60925
    Area-Compilers
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings (approach #2) #60906
    Area-Analyzers
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Epic] Route Groups #41433
    7.0.0
  • [Route Groups] Investigate callback based API #41432
  • [Route Groups] Implement IApplicationBuilder to support grouped middleware #41431
  • [Route Groups] Investigate link generation bug #41430
  • [Route Groups] Add default metadata to endpoints exposing group structure #41429
  • [Route Groups] WithTags et al. should target IEndpointConventionBuilder #41428
  • [Route Groups] Support custom IEndpointConventionBuilder types #41427
    7.0-preview5
  • Improve Model Binding for HTTP Request Body as Stream #41426
  • Quarantine E2E culture-aware tests #41425
    .NET 7 Planning
  • select component renders on first change with null value when inside CascadingValue=this and plain wrapper #41424
  • Api Suggestion [ViewModel ] Attribute for for poco tags #41423
  • Client generated code, from OpenAPI, could not bind route parameter of a Minimal Endpoint when route pattern's parameter and delegate's parameter case does not match #41422
  • Allow parameter and return types of route handler delegates (API Controllers) to contribute to endpoint metadata #41421
  • Disable authenticator app #41420
  • SignalR es5 #41419
  • 'Unable to load shared library 'kernel32.dll' or one of its dependencies. #41417
  • Kestrel host throws null exception when writing response #41416
  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #41415

Closed

  • Multiple route match simultaneously #41354
  • Finish implementations for non-generic rate limiters (Fixed windows, Sliding windows, Token bucket, Concurrency limiter) #37381
    7.0-preview5
  • Improve minimal api routing with grouping #36007
    7.0-preview4
  • IResult types don't throw ArgumentNullException for parameters declared as non-nullable reference types on Execute and PopulateMetadata methods #41383
    7.0-preview5
  • Calling InvokeAsync(StateHasChanged) causes page to fallback to default culture #28521
  • Razor binding in button isnt displayed #41357
  • [Blazor] @bind async #22394
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #41404
  • OpenIdConnect Access Token Claims #41385

PullRequests

Created

  • !fixup! Reference Html.Abstractions projects #41413
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Update SDK #41158
    blocked, area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Try out 1es images #41400
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Ensure IResult types throw ArgumentNullExceptions on public methods #41412
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Fix flaky HTTP/2 test #41181
    area-runtime
  • Helix Restore Issue Mitigation #41311
    area-infrastructure
  • Draft Surrogate argument list #41325
    area-web-frameworks
  • Sync shared code from runtime #41317
    blocked, area-runtime
  • Allow Multiple Wildcard Prefix Server Names of the Same Length in SNI Configuration #41402
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Fix MapPath and UsePathBase's use of implicit PathStrings #41382
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Zero byte reads support for EnableBuffering/FileBufferingReadStream #41410
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Update duende versions to 6.0.4 #41370
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for RouteHandlerInvocationContext<> overloads #41406
    area-web-frameworks
  • Enable trimming for middleware and friends #41373
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-counters renders incorrectly in certain situations #3036

Closed

    .NET 7.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DisplayActionSheet Inside a Shell Does Not Work on Windows #6639
  • ImageSource.LoadImage callback is never invoked on Windows #6638
  • CollectionView on iOS won't respect SelectionMode #6635
  • Unable to render online image using XAML Image control #6634
  • Tried to get a simple expander view to work. Works fine on Android but not on Windows #6632
  • RadioButton ControlTemplate ignored on Windows #6630
  • VisualStateManager Works Differently on Windows and Android #6629
  • Changing image source on Android causes flicker between images #6625
  • [IOS] Building and debugging related issues #6624
  • DisplayActionSheet hangs app on cancel on MacCatalyst #6623
  • OnPlatform with Thickness breaks XAML Hot Reload #6619
  • Layout position not updated correctly while dynamically updated in windows platform #6618
  • Remove preview branding form the templates for GA #6617
    6.0.300
  • Remove Debug.Asserts Added from this PR #6616
    6.0.300
  • RadioButton with an inline content definition doesn't display it properly on Android #6614
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Android.Webkit namespace is not found and project does not compile when classes are in Platform/Android directory #6610
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Frames cause debug output spam and degrade performance on Android #6606
    6.0.300-servicing
  • iOS CollectionView size calculation #6605
    6.0.300
  • Run Worker service from MAUI throw exception #6604
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Android] - ScrollView does not scroll since RC2 when the contained StackLayout has a margin #6602
    6.0.300
  • Changing BaseSize attribute of MauiSplashScreen element within a project does not get picked up #6600
    6.0.300
  • [Android] When adding child in ScrollView, the vertical layout options of the child (of child) is not working #6599
    6.0.300
  • "My Recipe" button looks like Disabled control but it is not. #6598
    6.0.300-servicing
  • WCAG 2.5.5: Touch inputs must have a sufficient target size. (android.widget.Button) #6597
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Page.BackgroundColor and others not reacting to changes in Application.Current.UserAppTheme #6596
    6.0.300
  • “.NET MAUI gallery” not announced as heading. #6594
    6.0.300-servicing
  • RC 2 BoxView is not placed at the top right #6593
    6.0.300-servicing
  • RC2 - The BackgroundColor of the BoxView does not work #6592
  • views overlap on image in Grid and Vertical StackLayout #6590
    6.0.300
  • [RC2] Android - The Navigation.PushModalAsync view cannot be full screen when the NavigationBar and StatusBar was hidden. #6589
  • IServiceCollection Not Being Initialized Using builder.Services.AddTransient<SomeCLRClass>() #6587
  • Label FormattedText causes text miss-alignment and clipping #6585
  • [Android] The ItemTapped event of ListView has no response for a while after Shell's tab changed #6584
  • Loading image using ImageSource.FromFile not working on Android #6583
  • Shell Title Changes Randomly (iOS/macOS) after navigation #6582
  • If Listview IsEnabled is false, items are still enabled #6581
  • iOS/macOS Images not cropped inside of a Frame #6580
  • ANDROID: Problem with on release apk not working. #6578
  • ContentView inside Grid causes "Element not found" exception under certain conditions #6577
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Android application in Release requires permission whereas Debug does not #6576

Closed

  • AppThemeBinding interferes with VisualStateManager #4540
    6.0.300
  • VerticalOptions.Center ignored on iOS, Droid and Windows #6561
  • [Windows] Wrong Grid columns and rows Auto sizing #4167
    6.0.300
  • [Android] FlexLayout bindable layout not rendering content #4084
    6.0.300
  • [iOS & MacOS] Preview 14 Shell Renders as Blank White/Black Screen on iOS & MacCatalyst #6545
  • [Bug] Shell.BackgroundColor in UWP and iOS #3077
    6.0.300
  • ListView Margins inside ViewCells on P13 are broken #4719
    6.0.300
  • [Shell, WinUI] FlyoutHeaderBehavior #1626
  • FlexLayout property values don't have intellisense #6325
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Shell FlyoutItem Icon doesn't render first time #6243
    6.0.300
  • AppShell Flyout Content Missing #6061
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Shell flyout item text sometimes blank #6033
    6.0.300
  • Shell: Top tabs are not displayed correctly (wrong color on Android, invisible on Windows) #6558
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Android] Frame using IsClippedToBounds not rendering #4077
    6.0.300
  • Label Shadow not working correctly on Windows #6150
    6.0.300
  • Fix Platform Compatibility Code Analysis Violations #823
  • First call to database always fails on Android Release #6607
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • RC2 Solution can't build if CommunityToolkit.Maui is installed #6550
  • [Bug] iOS: Image isn't shown on the screen if it is added into project as EmbeddedResource #3845
    6.0.300
  • Blazor Maui .Net 6 /Request Again Permission (Deny Mode) In Blazor Page #4170
  • Button Property Changes Ignored #6560
    6.0.300
  • [MacCatalyst] Lifecycle events don't trigger for minimizing and locking device #6507
  • [Bug] Wrong default colors in TabbedPage #2776
    6.0.300
  • Unable to run MAUI app in physical iOS device #6591
  • FontImageSource: "Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: width and height must be > 0" on some devices #5943
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [mauipalooza] ImageButton doesn't render gradient brush background #5929
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Button stays enabled even if set as disabled if it is bound to a command #5959
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Http Client Maui Blazor #6219
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] Buttons's Border Color not rendering #2980
  • VerticalOptions with Expand don't Expand StackLayout #3647
    6.0.300

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid unnecessary final measure call on Auto/Auto cell #6637
    area/layout 🔲
  • Restore and fix tvOS checks and annotations and remove PlatformVersion #6636
  • [singleproject] fix changing $(ApplicationDisplayVersion) inside VS #6628
    area/single project ☝️
  • Update AdaptiveTrigger to support multi-window #6627
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [src/Templates] Remove preview language #6622
    area/blazor 🕸️, do-not-merge, area/templates 📄
  • [Tizen] Bump Tizen.UIExtensions from 0.6.0-pre1 to 0.8.0-pre1 #6615
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, platform/tizen
  • [Android] Update the adapter used by RecyclerViewScrollListener #6601
    area/collectionview 📃, partner/android, 6.0.300
  • [Tizen] Fix GetPath to return a correct path #6588
    platform/tizen

Merged

  • [Xaml] add designTypeConverters for FlexEnums #6537
  • Update ShellToolBar when applicable appearance elements change #6422
  • Fix viewcell margins on listview #6431
    area/ListView
  • [Windows] Implement FlyoutHeaderBehavior property #5345
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Handle CA1416 violations found in MAUI repo #6237
  • Fix various combinations of Shell Elements on WinUI #6564
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows] Fix wrong shadow size on Label inside CollectionView #6608
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [android] update AOT profile #6548
    area/perf 🏎️, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Android] Fix issue not updating changes from Button BorderWidth, etc #6603
    t/bug, control-button

Updated

  • Fix MAUI Blazor crash for multi-window Windows apps #6516
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [foldable] Package reference instead of project reference #6514
    area/controls 🎮, area/infrastructure 🏗️, control-dualscreen
  • Make Android sizing of ShapeViews consistent with iOS and Windows #6206
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows] MenuBarItems are now rendered when Shell.Title is not set #6497
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • [workload] Merge Dependencies and Extensions packs #5918
    do-not-merge, area/setup 🪄
  • Clean up the windows code a bit #6501
    platform/windows 🪟, area/hosting 🧩, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Avoid notify changes from a null or disposed control #6060
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix for 3848 - FlexLayout doesn't measure content #6085
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [iOS] Observable collection events not firing in the correct order with CollectionView.BeginInvokeOnMainThread #6546
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Windows] Fix incorrectly Button with image size #6542
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Add User-Agent when downloading image streams #5985
    t/bug, area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge, .NET 7
  • Blazor Hybrid iOS Safe Areas #6432
    area/blazor 🕸️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0.300
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1020.30 to 1.0.1185.39 #6308
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add support for user defined aggregate window functions #27912
  • EF Core 6.0 temporal tables - extra migrations generated when no change #27911
  • Joining another entity with list navigation property of the queried entity #27909
  • Configuring an IModelCacheKeyFactory causes "the requested configuration is not stored in the read-optimized model" #27907
  • How to stop Entity Framework from including related data automatically #27906
  • could not be translated. Either rewrite the query in a form that can be translated #27905
  • Multiple one-to-one relations in one entity generate differently in migration #27904

Closed

  • ArgumentException on loading database values of object owned by owned object #27899
  • migration " ConcurrencyToken" every time #27908
  • Tracking issue when adding new entity with new navigational properties #27838
  • Checking keyless entity is null #27816
  • Issue with EF 6 migration from ef 3.1 instead of delete perform update. #27805
  • DbContext Thread Safe #27900

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0.x] Add [DynamicDependency] on DateOnly/TimeOnly for trimming #27910
    Servicing-approved
  • Add TPC support for data seeding #27903

Updated

  • [6.0.x] Return null constraint names for keys and FKs on entity types not mapped to a table. #27857
    Servicing-approved
  • Remove ValueBuffer from update pipeline #27898
  • Refactor UpdateSqlGenerator to separate select logic #27902

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet install script treats `-Channel 7.0 -Version latest` as Preview 2 #13715

Closed

  • When will packages be available in the Ubuntu 21.10 repository? #12740
  • Ubuntu 22.04 #13719
  • dotnet-install script is unable to resolve channel: `release/5.0.1xx-preview4` #7579

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove sha from source tarball repo dir names #13726
  • Update smoke-test prereq artifact to include architecture #13725
  • Onboard templating repo into source-build tarball #13724
  • Add msbuild patch to eliminate prebuilts #13723
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #13721

Merged

  • Add a direct reference to a newer version of this package #13709
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #13714
